mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Simulate (number, machineID, attendanceDate, startTime, endTime, areaID, minutes) VALUES (#{number}, #{machineID}, #{attendanceDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{areaID}, #{minutes})
mapper.select: SELECT id, number, machineID, attendanceDate, startTime, endTime, areaID, minutes FROM Simulate order by attendanceDate desc, startTime desc
SELECT id, number, machineID, attendanceDate, startTime, endTime, areaID, minutes FROM Simulate WHERE number like concat('%', #{number}, '%')
